huji.ac.il.stick_defence

Class Soldier

  • java.lang.Object
    • huji.ac.il.stick_defence.Soldier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawableObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicSoldier, BazookaSoldier, BombGrandpa, Swordman, Tank, Zombie

    public abstract class Soldier
extends java.lang.Object
implements DrawableObject
    This class represents an abstract soldier figure. Extension of this class must handle the transition to the attack mode by itself. This can be handled by attack() and isAttack() methods.

        public static void resetIds()
